title: Hand Pose Detection with ml5.js
description: In this video, I explore the HandPose model using ml5.js. I'll demonstrate how to track hand keypoints and create an interactive painting sketch using gestures.

timestamps.title: Creating a painting sketch with index and thumb
Storing previous hand position to draw a line

codeExamples.title: HandPose - Keypoints
codeExamples.description: This sketch demonstrates how to render all of the 21 keypoints detected by the handPose model.

codeExamples.title: HandPose - Painting
codeExamples.description: This sketch demonstrates how to draw using the index finger tip and thumb tip keypoints.

codeExamples.title: Simple painting
codeExamples.description: This sketch demonstrates drawing with mouseX, mouseY, pmouseX, pmouseY.

codeExamples.title: HandPose Painting - Stroke Weight
codeExamples.description: This sketch demonstrates how to change the stroke weight with the left hand.

codeExamples.title: HandPose Painting - Color
codeExamples.description: This sketch demonstrates how to change colors with left hand taps.

codeExamples.title: HandPose - Thumbs up or Thumbs Down
codeExamples.description: This sketch demonstrates how to recognize a gesture based on the relative positions of two keypoints.

codeExamples.title: HandPose - Particles
codeExamples.description: This sketch demonstrates how to emit particles from the keypoints of the hand.
